negative: Gaming will kill the battery even faster, and it will lower its performance dropping the frame rate badly on battery.
It's a nice enough laptop, but averaging 3.5 hours of battery life from extremally light tasks with my mentioned battery saving attempts is bad, the linux sleep thing is bad too.

As for keyboard, idk how to review this because I've never used what's objectively deemed a bad or lousy keyboard, but lenovo said they did copy the thinkpad keyboard design so I dont think you'll face any issues or discomfort.
